nodes.text: The SA-27 Suppression Droid was a model of bipedal battle droid used by the the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War. SA-27 Suppression Droids were among the forces stationed at the ruptured vault under the command of the Shroud's lieutenant Peej.

SA-27 Suppression Droids appear as enemies in one of the macrobinoculars missions—"An Emerging Dread" for Republic players and "A Spy's Secret" for Imperials— in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
